description:
- Collaborate with a 5 persons team of Developers to create fully functional and optimized full-stack applications using varying technologies.
- Present a variety of applications to peers and mentors.
- Led team as scrum master through a full-stack project.

- Collaborate with the Marketing and creative team to create animated assets for various viewing experiences (Stadium banners/Urbain Displays/Social Media...).
- Prepare rough drafts and present ideas to shareholders.
- Plan and organize project design choices on Figma for review.
- Prepare dynamic files for  integration into the Celtra Platform.
- Package source materials for hand-off to the production team.
- Edit music and visuals to create an engaging experience.
- Established a clear and efficient work pipeline for animation projects.

- Making sure that the site assets are consistent and straightforward.
- Liaising with the localization and the site operations teams to meet deadlines.
- Partnering with the creative and online merchandising teams to define the design requirements in order to execute on the concept and meet the project goals.
- Localizing the site assets and making sure that every locale and language on the site shows a harmonious design and a clear messaging.

- Created a full photo/video coverage for multiple musical events.
- Created a full pitch video presentation for possible client (Ooredoo).
- Mini-series filming editing and mixing for the agency.
- Trained interns in video shooting and editing.
- Trained fellow co-workers in DSLR Photography & the essential principles of photography.
